name: UCI Visual Novel
description:
This visual novel project was made for UCI's INF 151 course and borrows background images from UCI, Google Images, and Unsplash.com.

Our development team is comprised of:

Rachit Ahuja - Narrative Designer

Emerson Chow - Background Artist / Programmer

Aliyah F. Clayton - Programmer / Producer

Nham Dinh - Narrative Designer

Kristine Nguyen - Character Artist
